nodes.text: The Guardian 5e Personal Defense Speeder was a model of airspeeder produced by Ubrikkian Industries during the Galactic Civil War. Presenting a classic look, with its hidden weapons, the Guardian was favored by bodyguards, security firms and governments for transporting VIPs and dignitaries. A Guardian E2 Escape Speeder Bike served as an emergency escape vehicle which could be launched from the rear of the speeder, or drop from the below. The limited altitude capability of the bike required the Guardian 5e to be at a maximum altitude of 350 meters.
